ygData.subject: Re: newbie smithy
ygData.msgSnippet: elders and dervs drop it too infrequent to be useful its better to just spend the money and stay in freeport till you can make gorgets and bracers (50-60) ore
ygData.messageBody:
elders and dervs drop it too infrequent to be useful

its better to just spend the money and stay in freeport till you can make gorgets and bracers (50-60)

ore is in north freep near the bank i believe, metal and molds are in east freep as are skewer molds

Glenfinen Mal, Human mage, Lvl 20 of Cazic Thule

At 04:56 PM 7/8/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: yur@...
>
>
>
>I have 80 plat in the bank and I have around 60 points saved up at the guild
>master. he offer me smithing so i will take full advantage of it. But i was
>wondering if i can buy metal or ore or whatever at merchants instead of trying
>to kill rock dervishes for them ?? Can i buy rusty daggers at merchants ?
>
>btw, i am lvl 18 and wouldn't mind camping out newbie zones to get these ores.
>
>Erudite, Wizard.
>
>Richard Yu - IBM
